title: The doves that helped Israel win a war
text:
The doves that helped Israel win a war 10:35pm IST - 01:18 
As Israel gears up for its 70th anniversary, a dovecote on a kibbutz is dedicated to telling a little-known part of the story. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
